translation: Dhritarashtra said, "What did my people and the sons of Pandu do when they had assembled together, eager for battle, on the holy plain of Kurukshetra, O Sanjaya?"
commentary: 1.1 In the field of religion on the holy plain? Kurukshetra in Kurukshetra? assembled assembled together? Yuyutsavah desirous to fight? My people my people? Pandavas the sons of Pandu? f and? Eve also? What what? Akurvat did do? Sanjaya O Sanjaya.Commentary Dharmakshetra -- that place which protects Dharma is Dharmakshetra. Because it was in the land of the Kurus? it was called Kurukshetra.Sanjaya is one who has conered likes and dislikes and who is impartial.
